Ã‚Â³                       Game Notes &amp; Crack Information                       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   The Settlers III is the latest title in a tremendously popular series of Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   games which has sold over 1 million copies. It's an immense god sim with Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   a real-time, strategic simulation of prosperity, tactics, combat and     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   growth. Control the full cycle of your civilization's evolution, from    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   the initial planning and building of its infrastructure, to the full-    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   blooded conflict of race against race in the quest to expand your power  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   and domination. Before you start conquering your neighbors, however,     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll first need to create a sustainable economy from the               Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   interdependent activities of agriculture, industry and trading. The      Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   Settlers III is built upon a combination of vibrant colors, exacting     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   detail and non-stop gameplay, and  populated by restless characters of   Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   hypnotic charm and humor. The on-screen experience successfully          Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   translates the immense depth, intelligence and strategic complexity of   Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   the game into an entirely absorbing and addictive player-friendly        Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   environment. It will not only engage the minds of the most discerning    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   strategy player, but also capture the imagination of the fantasist       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   within us all.                                                           Ã‚Â³

Ã‚Â³                         Usage information and notes:                       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                       ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~                      Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   To install this game, simply unZIP, make a dir for the game, unACE with  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   ace32.exe  ex:ace32 x -y -v settler3.c01 c:gamesset3&lt;--put that slash Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   Then you need to double click the .reg file, run serial.exe and then     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   run SETUPS3.EXE to configure the game for your machine.  After all this  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   just double-click on that SETTLER3.EXE and enjoy yourself!
